```{r}

```

Bring in the data. Limiting to 1900-2000 (for sample size), and keeping only authors with 3+ works. Set depvar.

```{r}
d <- read_tsv("liwc/liwc_w_meta.tsv")

d <- d |>
  filter(firstpub < 2001 & firstpub > 1899) |> 
  filter(authof3ormore == TRUE) |> 
  rename(author = hathi_author)
```

```{r}
cwidth <- 10
pwidth <- 10

dd <- d |> 
 mutate(cohort = floor((birthyear-1825)/cwidth)*cwidth + 1825,
        year = floor(firstpub/pwidth)*pwidth) |> 
  group_by(cohort) |> 
  add_tally() |> 
  filter(n > 100) # drop small cohort groups

ggplot(dd, aes(y = posemo, 
               x = year, 
               group = factor(cohort), 
               color = factor(cohort))) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ poly(x, 2)) +
  theme_minimal()

```

LME4 (frequentist MLM)

```{r}
library(lme4)
width <- 10

dd <- d |> 
 mutate(cohort = floor((birthyear-1825)/width)*width + 1825,
        year = floor(firstpub/width)*width,
        age = authorage - 45)

m1 <- lmer(money*100 ~ age + I(age^2) + (1|cohort) + (1|year),
     data = dd,
     REML = TRUE)

# proportion of cohort variance (delta)
VarCorr(m1)$cohort[[1]] / ( VarCorr(m1)$cohort[[1]] + VarCorr(m1)$year[[1]] )


```

FE ANOVA

```{r}
library(rstatix)

width <- 10

dd <- d |> 
 mutate(cohort = floor((birthyear-1825)/width)*width + 1825,
        year = floor(firstpub/width)*width,
        age = authorage - 45)

m1 <- lm(posemo ~ age + I(age^2) + factor(cohort) + factor(year),
         data = dd)
at <- anova_test(m1, detailed = TRUE)

C_mse <- at[3,2] / at[3,4]
P_mse <- at[4,2] / at[4,4]

C_mse / (C_mse + P_mse)

```

Iterate!

```{r}

my_fit <- function(df) {
  lm(value ~ age + I(age^2) + factor(year) + factor(cohort), data = df )
}

my_vc <- function(model) {
  
  at <- anova_test(model, detailed = TRUE)
  
  C_mse <- at[3,2] / at[3,4]
  P_mse <- at[4,2] / at[4,4]

  C_mse / (C_mse + P_mse)
  
}
  

dd_long <- dd |> 
  pivot_longer(cols = WC:filler) |> 
  group_by(name) |> 
  nest() |> 
  mutate(model = map(data, my_fit),
         delta = map(model, my_vc)) |> 
  select(name, delta) |> 
  mutate(delta = as.numeric(delta))

hist(dd_long$delta)


```
